personality_sketch: Sofia moved to London to experience life in a vibrant city. She loves music festivals and is an avid fan of live performances. Her outgoing nature helps her juggle her busy lifestyle with ease.

personality_sketch: Zeynep is a warm and caring individual who cherishes her community connections in Dalston.
